pages.text: Time Fluid is a multi-purpose fluid powering all time altering Items and Blocks. It doesn't seem to be entirely part of this timesteam, as it is nearly transparent.$(br2)It is created by dropping a $(l:justdirethings:res_time_crystal)Time Crystal$(/l) into a pool of $(l:justdirethings:res_polymorphic_fluid)Polymorphic Fluid.$(/l)
